menus.name: Bruschetta Classica
menus.summary: Grilled bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, garlic, and extra virgin olive oil.
menus.description: Our signature bruschetta features thick slices of artisanal bread, perfectly grilled and rubbed with fresh garlic. Topped with ripe San Marzano tomatoes, fresh basil leaves, and finished with our house-made extra virgin olive oil. A perfect start to any Italian meal.

menus.name: Antipasto Misto
menus.summary: Selection of cured meats, cheeses, olives, and marinated vegetables
menus.description: A generous platter featuring the finest Italian cured meats including prosciutto di Parma, salami, and mortadella. Accompanied by aged cheeses, marinated vegetables, Kalamata olives, and served with fresh focaccia bread.

menus.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menus.summary: Classic Roman pasta with eggs, pancetta, pecorino cheese, and black pepper.
menus.description: Authentic Roman carbonara made with al dente spaghetti, crispy pancetta, farm-fresh eggs, aged Pecorino Romano, and freshly cracked black pepper. Prepared using traditional techniques for the perfect creamy texture without cream.

menus.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
menus.summary: Fresh fettuccine pasta in rich cream sauce with parmesan and butter.
menus.description: House-made fettuccine pasta tossed in our signature Alfredo sauce, made with heavy cream, butter, and freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano. A rich and indulgent classic that melts in your mouth.

menus.name: Margherita Pizza
menus.summary: San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, and extra virgin olive oil.
menus.description: The queen of pizzas featuring our hand-stretched dough topped with San Marzano tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella di bufala, fresh basil leaves, and finished with extra virgin olive oil. Baked in our wood-fired oven for the perfect crispy crust.

menus.name: Pizza Diavola
menus.summary: Spicy salami, mozzarella, tomato sauce, and chili flakes.
menus.description: For those who like it hot! Our spicy pizza features a base of San Marzano tomato sauce, mozzarella, spicy salami, and finished with crushed chili flakes. The perfect balance of heat and flavor.

menus.name: Osso Buco
menus.summary: Braised veal shanks with saffron risotto and gremolata.
menus.description: Tender veal shanks slowly braised in white wine and vegetables until fall-off-the-bone tender. Served with creamy saffron risotto and topped with fresh gremolata. A true Milanese classic that represents the pinnacle of Italian comfort food.

menus.name: Branzino al Sale
menus.summary: Mediterranean sea bass baked in sea salt with herbs and lemon.
menus.description: Fresh Mediterranean sea bass baked whole in a crust of coarse sea salt mixed with fresh herbs. This ancient technique seals in moisture and flavor while creating incredibly tender, flaky fish. Served with roasted vegetables and lemon.

menus.name: Tiramisu
menus.summary: Classic Italian dessert with mascarpone, coffee, and cocoa.
menus.description: The ultimate Italian dessert featuring layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and rich mascarpone cream, delicately flavored with Marsala wine and dusted with premium cocoa powder. Made fresh daily in our kitchen

menus.name: Panna Cotta
menus.summary: Silky vanilla custard with berry coulis and fresh berries.
menus.description: Silky smooth vanilla-infused custard made with fresh cream and Madagascar vanilla beans, Served with a vibrant berry coulis and topped with seasonal fesh berries. Light, elegent, and the perfect ending to any meal.
